name: css-min-heights
description: Css module of single purpose classes for min heights

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-min-heights.css > css/css-min-heights.css && tachyons src/css-min-heights.css --minify > css/css-min-heights.min.css && tachyons src/css-min-heights.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
